thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Panagiotis Gioldaseas
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Panagiotis Gioldaseas

author: Panagiotis Gioldaseas
title: Panagiotis Gioldaseas
text:
I had a big delay on delivery my order.
After I asked explanations about this delay, they were very friendly and the asked me if I want a refund or a resend.
I asked a resend and the reacted immediately by resend me the order.
I am very satisfied with the company and that was the first problem after many orders.
I recommend Banggood as one of the best.
